LanguageData.Apparel_PersonalNanoShield.label: Nanite Shield Modulator
LanguageData.Apparel_PersonalNanoShield.description: Controls Nanites that have been implanted in the colonist. These are used to shield the colonist from damage. The Nanites are depleted when they are activated and must be periodically replaced at the Colonist Upgrade Station after taking damage.
